summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6709 for the improvement of 33rd Ave. S. from S. Alaska St. to S. Oregon St.; by constructing concrete sidewalks together with curbs and gutters; by such grading or regrading as may be necessary; providing for the necessary surface drainage; under Ordinance No. 107764, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of Land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
